sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container class="app-wrapper">
    <el-header height="60px">
      <page-header />
    </el-header>
    
    <el-container>
      <el-aside width="200px">
        <page-sidebar />
      </el-aside>
      
      <el-main>
        <router-view ref="currentView"></router-view>
      </el-main>
    </el-container>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
import PageHeader from './components/Header.vue'
import PageSidebar from './components/Sidebar.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    PageHeader,
    PageSidebar
  },
  methods: {
    handleMenuSelect(index) {
      if (index === 'settings') {
        // 如果当前页面是 StreamCheck，调用其重置方法
        if (this.$refs.currentView && this.$refs.currentView.$options.name === 'StreamCheck') {
          this.$refs.currentView.resetAllStates()
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
.app-wrapper {
  height: 100vh;
}

.el-header {
  background-color: #409EFF;
  color: white;
  line-height: 60px;
  padding: 0;
}

.el-aside {
  background-color: #545c64;
  color: white;
}

.el-main {
  background-color: #f0f2f5;
  padding: 20px;
}
</style>
